item.title: VMware Cloud on AWS - Managed Tanzu Kubernetes Grid with Tanzu Mission Control
item.description: How to configure Tanzu Mission Control to connect to a Managed Tanzu Kubernetes Grid instance running on VMware Cloud on AWS.

item.title: Tanzu Observability - First look at monitoring OpenShift & VMware Cloud on AWS
item.description: The is a technical walk-through on how to use Tanzu Observability to provide deep dive analytics for OpenShift running on VMware Cloud on AWS
